parameters.name: search
parameters.description: String to search for in adverts.

parameters.name: department
parameters.description: One or more departments (by `slug`) to filter on.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: One or more types (by `slug`) to filter on.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: One or more categories (by `slug`) to filter on.

parameters.name: involvedParty
parameters.description: One or more involved parties (by `slug`) to filter on.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Date from which to filter adverts on, inclusive, takes into account `createdDate`, `updatedDate` and `signatureDate`.

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Date to which to filter adverts on, inclusive, takes into account `createdDate`, `updatedDate` and `signatureDate`.
